alert.note: Alert for Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Windham and northeastern Tolland Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1029 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Preston, or over Jewett City, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Hail up to penny size, brief downpours and occasional cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Windham, Plainfield, Killingly, Putnam, Thompson, Brooklyn, Woodstock, Willington, Canterbury, Ashford, Pomfret, Chaplin, Hampton, Eastford, Scotland and Union. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
